review:
I visited the doctor last year - in June-July 2021. I had been having a lot of pain in my leg and it was becoming very difficult to sit and work. Even mild exercise was also becoming difficult. It seemed like an ortho/ physio issue and so I looked up Dr. Bachani's reviews and went to see him.

While his setup was very professional, he was very quick to recommend X-Rays and treatments, without giving due attention to the problem. Over the next month I went to his clinic multiple times, spending a ton of money for each appointment - including physio exercises and even an MRI but the problem did not get fixed. He looked up my records and suggested that there was a possible spinal issue responsible for the pain. Spinal issues can be lifelong problems, and this diagnosis let to a lot of worry and anxiety.

Ultimately, when I felt that the problem was not getting fixed and Dr. Bachani kept giving medicines and his physio team kept calling me back for sessions, I finally decided to consult another ortho doctor and also another physiotherapist. **** ** ***** ******* ******** ** ***** *** *** ********** *** **** ** *** ********** **** *** ********* ********** *** * ************ *** *** **** ***** *** ********* ** ** **** *** ********* **** *** ********** ****** ******* **** * ***** ** *** ** **** ********************* *** ****** ** *** ***** ******** * ******* ******** *** ******* *** ******* ** **** ********** I am perfectly fine now.

I wanted to wait to write this review, just in case Dr. Bachani was right and if my problem hadn't fixed with the alternative exercise,  it would be unfair to criticize him.

But my problem did get fixed and I am appalled at the carelessness at which I was treated, the anxiety the diagnosis caused, and also the unnecessary expense that I incurred.****** * **** ***** ********** *** *** ***** ** ***** *** ******* ** *** ******* This is something I have also seen with some other doctors. The staff just keeps focusing on getting you to pay - even before you see the doctor or have any sense of the issue -  while not paying enough attention to solving the problem.

I wouldn't recommend his services.
